item.title: 24/7 CTF Hidden Painting
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Description We created a hidden painting which will lead you to the flag. Can you connect the dots and piece it back together? Solution We are given a secret_map.txt file, which contains lines and lines of 2 hex values. $ head secret_map.txt 0x4b 0x9d0 0x44 0x974 0x33 0x92 0x2f 0x660 0x48 0xe1 0x47 0x59c 0x5b 0x4cf 0x7c 0x489 0x32 0x5f0 0x41 0x62 My first idea was that they were coordinates: each line contained a first value for x and a second value for y.
